publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5830 John Swinney: The Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson*

S3M-5830 John Swinney: The Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Town and Country Planning (Fees for Applications and Deemed Applications) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson
